page.title: 14CHILDRENS GAMES - FOXES
page.content: You need about six or seven people to play this game,but you can't play it with less than four.One,two or three people are the foxes and the rest are the chickens.The chickens have a base and the foxes have a prison.However,a chicken can be freed by another free chicken if the free chicken touches the captive one.The fox can only stop this by touching both of them.A chicken cannot be freed when he is outside the prison.When all the chickens are caught the first one,two or three chickens to be caught are foxes in the next game.Sometimes chickens can be freed when a free chicken pretends to be caught and secretly frees all the captured ones.If there is only one fox,then it takes quite a long time to catch the chickens,but if there are more foxes it takes less time.
